Hero.title: Luciano Rafael Flores
Hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
Hero.paragraph: I build scalable web solutions using modern technologies like React.js, Node.js, and Python. Recent Computer Software Development graduate with hands-on experience in hackathons, collaborative projects, and freelance technical support.

Services.heading: Landing Page Creation Service
Services.description: Transform your ideas into stunning, high-converting landing pages that captivate your audience

features.title: Modern Tech Stack
features.description: Built with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance

features.title: Custom Design
features.description: Unique, eye-catching designs tailored to your brand identity

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Quick turnaround times without compromising on quality

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Built with best practices for search engine visibility

Services.exampleDescription: A modern landing page showcasing a venue rental service with elegant design, smooth animations, and responsive layout. Built with Next.js and featuring image galleries, contact forms, and optimized performance.
